divs: sighting detailswe had the same exact encounter as the person in lebanon, ohio on setptember 29, 2012. we were driving home from 5 guys cheeseburgers around 9:00 pm on red lion five points rd., in springboro, ohio when my husband decided to go a different route home. instead of turning left into our subdivision, he wanted to take the "long" way home. when he decided not to turn into our subdivsion i looked out the truck window to my right (west) and saw what looked like a falling meteorite.. at first i thought it was a shooting star, but it was way too large as it was vertically dropping from the sky. it was dropping rapidly and looked like it was breaking up\disintegrating, at that point my husband and i had pulled over into a park to watch it. then all of a sudden 3-4 star like objects apppeared and the star like objects lifted\rose in elevation together. we were loosing sight of the objects in the trees to the west, so we backed up in the park and drove towards the entrance of the park and another car pulled in as well. all of this transpired over 3-4 minutes from the time i saw what i thought was a metiorite breaking up to the star like lights moving off in a sw direction in a boomerange like shape. as i stated above, this is the exact same phenomena we witnessed as the the lebanon, ohio sighting, and this is the second time i've seen this same phenomena occur, as the same type occurred in july, 2010.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Springboro
There were no other sightings in Springboro on or around September 29th 2012
Summary: Same exact sighting as the person had in Lebanon Ohio. We saw it in Springboro, Ohio for the 2nd time in 2 years.
